body:
<!-- Please only use this template for submitting reports about failing tests in Kubernetes CI jobs -->

**Which jobs are failing**:

CRI-O job in our CI using kubernetes master tests

**Which test(s) are failing**:

[sig-storage] In-tree Volumes [Driver: nfs] [Testpattern: Dynamic PV (default fs)] provisioning should provision storage with mount options

**Since when has it been failing**:

since this PR has been merged: https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/69441

**Testgrid link**:

link to our job is here:

https://openshift-gce-devel.appspot.com/build/origin-federated-results/pr-logs/pull/kubernetes-sigs_cri-o/1870/test_pull_request_crio_e2e_fedora/1368/
https://openshift-gce-devel.appspot.com/build/origin-federated-results/pr-logs/pull/kubernetes-sigs_cri-o/1874/test_pull_request_crio_e2e_fedora/1380/
https://openshift-gce-devel.appspot.com/build/origin-federated-results/pr-logs/pull/kubernetes-sigs_cri-o/1874/test_pull_request_crio_e2e_rhel/1557/

**Reason for failure**:

we don't know the reason of the failure but it doesn't seem related to CRI-O. It's constantly reproducible also.

**Anything else we need to know**:

/cc @jberkus @mkimuram @msau42

<!-- DO NOT EDIT BELOW THIS LINE -->
/kind failing-test

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG Storage.
labels.name: sig/storage

title: [sig-storage] In-tree Volumes [Driver: nfs] [Testpattern: Dynamic PV (default fs)] provisioning should provision storage with mount options failing on Fedora/RHEL and CRI-O
